main.name: Brandon Turner
main.description: I have been involved with software since I was 12 years old, I have been producing front end projects for clients since 2004 and full stack projects since 2011
main.bio: I have been in southern California my whole life and enjoy trying new restaurants, driving on canyon roads and good coffee. Technology wise my favorites are Node.js, REACT, MongoDB and Javascript.
main.contactmessage: Please send me a message if you have any questions or would like more information.

resume.skillmessage: I have tried most technologies in respect to full stack development. I excel with Javascript, REACT.js, Node.js and Mongodb.

education.description: Attended the WIT (Westlake Information Technology) Academy integegrated with the high school. The program introduced us to front end development and visual basic in 10th grade. I also learned about video editing, graphic design and Microsoft Access.
Great experience of higher education from Moorpark Community College.
Keeping myself current on the latest full stack technologies was covered extensively at UCLA Extension

work.title: Education Specialist for the Americas
work.description: Managed education material, license servers and latest versions for schools in North/South America. Support for deploying Cinema4D in any enviornment, manage render servers on AWS, multiple cloud services and private configurations

work.title: Trading/Technology Application Systems Admin
work.description: Manage communication and prioritization of projects with multiple departments with high dollar value liaison to Software Database Employees

projects.title: Blitz Report
projects.category: Web app for Fantasy Footbal fans. Keeps track and saves QB information weekly to user profiles.

projects.title: Van Cool
projects.category: Web app to manage carpools for companies with van pooling services. Can export data for company records.
